product_name: Electra Cruiser Knobby Bike Tire - 26 x 2.125
long_description: The 26 in. Electra Cruiser Knobby bike tire offers enhanced traction on dirt and gravel paths, for those times when your city rides happen to meander off the pavement. Wide knobby tire has a tread that's smooth enough to ride on pavement, yet knobby enough to offer good traction on gravel or dirt paths.
short_description: The 26 in. Electra Cruiser Knobby bike tire offers enhanced traction on dirt and gravel paths, for those times when your city rides happen to meander off the pavement.
